• Multiplayer mining game with real-time MQTT networking
  • Procedural terrain generation and block-based resource collection
  • Equipment upgrades, player shops, and admin moderation system
    const CONSTANTS = { TILE_SIZE: 32, CHUNK_SIZE: 16, SPEED_NORMAL: 2, SPEED_DRILL: 1 };
    this.map[ty][tx] = TILE_TYPES.EMPTY; this.spawnParticle(tx * 32 + 16, ty * 32 + 16, props.color, 8);

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated terrain using MQTT for real-time interaction. The core gameplay involves tunneling to collect resources while managing fuel and cargo limits. Players can trade ores at stations, upgrade equipment, and host multiplayer sessions with admin controls.
